mapper.sql:
select
a.`id` as 'id', a.`name` as 'name', a.`brief` as 'brief', a.`code` as 'code', a.`description` as 'description', a.`details` as 'details', a.`prototype_id` as 'prototypeId', a.`category_id` as 'categoryId', a.`is_published` as 'isPublished', a.`create_time` as 'createTime', a.`update_time` as 'updateTime', a.`thumb` as 'thumb',
from `t_goods` as a
